newsitem.title: USA: Dresser Q1 growth continued in Q2.
newsitem.headline: Dresser Q1 growth continued in Q2.

text.p: Dresser Industries Inc's growth in the first quarter (ended January 31) is continuing through the second quarter, chief operating officer Donald Vaughn said Tuesday.
"Much of the factor driving Dresser is the market," he told the Howard Weil Energy Conference.

For the full year, Vaughn continued, Dresser expects exploration and production spending to rise 10 percent, pipeline spending to rise 15 percent and subsea contracting spending to rise five to 10 percent.
"Twenty dollar (a barrel) oil and two dollar (per thousand cubic feet natural) gas still generate good activity."
He said Dresser expects 15 to 20 percent growth in return on equity this year. ((-- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.))
